---
id: experimental-features
title: Experimental Features
description: Experimental features provided by SpotX
---

# SpotX - Experimental Features

List of active experimental features provided in SpotX

## For Windows

### Ban/unban artists

**Feature from:** Spotify

**Description:** Enable context menu action to ban/unban artists

[![photo_2023-12-30_11-12-45](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/62529699/295891028-8b3d1d08-eed6-4044-8ca8-619fdcf6575e.jpg?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..9WhXMIs-kgn9ih0_zJaO_da_etrDa2DyNAzkrKe_yLM)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/62529699/295891028-8b3d1d08-eed6-4044-8ca8-619fdcf6575e.jpg?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..9WhXMIs-kgn9ih0_zJaO_da_etrDa2DyNAzkrKe_yLM)

* * * * *

### Top search bar

:::note
This feature is disabled by default
:::

**Feature from:** Spotify

**Description:** Show global nav bar with home button, search input and user avatar

To activate add input parameter `-topsearchbar`

[![photo_2023-12-30_11-49-28](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/62529699/295890415-cfb1aae7-9d2e-4ca1-8c6b-5e27cc42cd21.jpg?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..9C8LGfzuFSNE8TlSFrWyJI0YnDidP9TvRv2SI3EsOlQ)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/62529699/295890415-cfb1aae7-9d2e-4ca1-8c6b-5e27cc42cd21.jpg?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..9C8LGfzuFSNE8TlSFrWyJI0YnDidP9TvRv2SI3EsOlQ)

* * * * *

### Developer tools

:::note
This feature is disabled by default
:::

**Feature from:** Spotify

**Description:** Activates devtools which have been limited to use by Spotify employees only, to enable them, simply go to the bottom of the main settings and toggle the switch. After an automatic reload, you will have access to full development tools, including the debug window, cosmos debugger, and developer utils.

To activate add input parameter: `-devtools`

:::warning
Please use this only if you understand clearly what you are doing. SpotX provides access to these tools for familiarization purposes and is not responsible for your actions.
:::

:::note
Works from 1.1.98 and higher
:::

[![Снимок экрана 2023-11-12 184947](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/62529699/282311625-49f90fc0-6035-44c4-b5e9-3816bc3e07d4.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..2QUO1GYlWQcaSQxUGkpj2vroc5y4xGFHEEmtyalpOGU)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/62529699/282311625-49f90fc0-6035-44c4-b5e9-3816bc3e07d4.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..2QUO1GYlWQcaSQxUGkpj2vroc5y4xGFHEEmtyalpOGU)

* * * * *

### Plus button

:::note
This feature is disabled by default
:::

**Feature from:** Spotify

**Description:** The plus button replaces the heart button, you can save and select destinations for songs, playlists, or podcasts

To activate add input parameter `-plus`

![123](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/62529699/279784760-93bcd8cf-c00a-4106-b6f2-d660bd9cf7a2.gif?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..l2FuhVfBxoU9-zEZKGhklzhYI-Pbn43SUq-srM2W0UY)

* * * * *

### Smart shuffle

**Feature from:** Spotify

**Description:** Smart Shuffle adds recommended tracks to the play queue only in personal playlists

[![Снимок экрана 2023-10-16 105335](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/62529699/275431551-51e80383-2a4d-4775-816d-b3479bc6e9da.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..OqufMr3bpokE5sQYSb64CgidpqNhkmyf5EWTSC3IJRg)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/62529699/275431551-51e80383-2a4d-4775-816d-b3479bc6e9da.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..OqufMr3bpokE5sQYSb64CgidpqNhkmyf5EWTSC3IJRg)

* * * * *

### Funny progress bar

:::note
This feature is disabled by default
:::

**Feature from:** Spotify

**Description:** Funny progress bar.

To activate add input parameter `-funnyprogressBar`

[![2023-06-17_022802](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/62529699/246594308-d284c7ac-2932-40d4-b506-a2cda152bc04.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..1ZIB-05gsCLvDhhB9ge5MS5BlwzcmFeSNs2DXd3VA-4)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/62529699/246594308-d284c7ac-2932-40d4-b506-a2cda152bc04.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..1ZIB-05gsCLvDhhB9ge5MS5BlwzcmFeSNs2DXd3VA-4)

* * * * *

### Dynamic audio normalization

**Feature from:** Spotify

**Description:** Actively adjust the volume by leveling out the difference between quiet and loud parts of the audio.

[![orsfz1zk1h6b1](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/62529699/246594072-fb1365d8-247a-4ebd-9b47-e489356db1d0.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..6iA0QVx8u3DBk3u31w-NQMh4k5Z4NBSEQjTZCFxgJ_Q)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/62529699/246594072-fb1365d8-247a-4ebd-9b47-e489356db1d0.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..6iA0QVx8u3DBk3u31w-NQMh4k5Z4NBSEQjTZCFxgJ_Q)

* * * * *

### Audio cache clear limit changes

:::note
This feature is disabled by default
:::

**Feature from:** SpotХ

**Description:** Change limit for clearing audio cache.

`-cache_limit [number]` - from 500 to 20000

*Example:* set the cache limit to 700 MB `-cache_limit 700` or `-cl 700`

:::note
- By default for all users the limit is set to 10 GB
- Cleaning affects only the audio cache, downloaded tracks, podcasts will not be affected
:::

* * * * *

### The history of listening to songs

:::note
This feature is disabled by default
:::

**Feature from:** SpotХ

**Description:** The history of listening to the songs of your songs for use in the [Goofy](https://github.com/Chimildic/goofy) playlist builder.

Two input parameters are used for activation:
- `-urlform_goofy`
- `-idbox_goofy`

Detailed instructions on how to set up are [here](https://github.com/Chimildic/goofy/discussions/230), instructions in Russian, use a translator.

* * * * *

### Hiding Ad-like sections from the homepage

:::note
This feature is disabled by default
:::

**Feature from:** SpotX

**Description:** an attempt to keep only those sections on the main page that recommend music based on your listening.

To activate add input parameter `-adsections_off`

If you have your own thoughts about which sections to hide and which not, then write [here](https://github.com/amd64fox/SpotX/issues/195),\
if you still have a hidden section, then send its id [here](https://github.com/amd64fox/SpotX/issues/195) using [this instruction](https://github.com/amd64fox/SpotX/issues/195#issuecomment-1339230002).

[![Снимок экрана 2022-12-22 220611](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/62529699/209209076-775573d4-0f8c-42a0-94e6-5553cea5332a.jpg)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/62529699/209209076-775573d4-0f8c-42a0-94e6-5553cea5332a.jpg)\
[![Снимок экрана 2022-12-22 220419](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/62529699/209209080-a761c095-4785-411e-adc1-72eb7f939d7b.jpg)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/62529699/209209080-a761c095-4785-411e-adc1-72eb7f939d7b.jpg)

**full list of hidden sections:**

- Popular Albums / Artists
- Popular new releases
- Best of Artists / Tracks
- Best of songwriters
- Fresh New Music
- The state of music today
- Mood
- Today's biggest hits
- Throwback
- Trending now
- Popular radio
- Try something else
- Featured Charts
- The best of 2022
- The Best Christmas Music
- Happy Holidays

* * * * *

### Static themes for lyrics

:::note
This feature is disabled by default
:::

**Feature from:** SpotX

**Description:** Spotify in the original client uses automatic colors for lyrics, the color is selected based on the album art, sometimes this leads to colors that are not very pleasant to look at, this feature adds static themes.

list of available themes:

to activate a static theme use the input parameter `lyrics_stat`\
so for example we activate theme blueberry: `-lyrics_stat blueberry`

You can also add your own theme, just send your colors as specified in [this template](https://github.com/amd64fox/SpotX/issues/191#issuecomment-1289085228).

Almost all topics were made by [@IshanJ25](https://github.com/IshanJ25) many thanks to him\
also thanks for the idea [@CanYouJustWorkPlease](https://github.com/CanYouJustWorkPlease)\
[![234 (1)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/62529699/212337349-d475014e-7c10-4d00-b518-1d8dcdcbbdc8.png)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/62529699/212337349-d475014e-7c10-4d00-b518-1d8dcdcbbdc8.png)

* * * * *

### Unlock in device picker

**Feature from:** SpotX (Spotify Premium)

**Description:** Unlock in device picker.

:::note
Not all devices can be unlocked, some devices check the premium subscription through the server.
:::

| Before | After |
| --- | --- |
| [![182448719-046a6490-d6eb-4375-9943-3cfdc8f41cec](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/62529699/192094591-51f892be-859a-4ca8-a620-949cca26781f.png)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/62529699/192094591-51f892be-859a-4ca8-a620-949cca26781f.png) | [![182452241-32d94aff-2028-47c4-843b-03baf55d2b45](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/62529699/192094589-c61132c4-4a39-4ba2-8dd7-5fea9a59a208.png)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/62529699/192094589-c61132c4-4a39-4ba2-8dd7-5fea9a59a208.png) |

* * * * *

### Full screen mode

**Feature from:** SpotX (Spotify Premium)

**Description:** Turns on full screen mode when listening to music

![Анимация](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/62529699/192094260-c122ac4f-6068-4d2f-b516-6141159d2a1f.gif)

* * * * *

### New home structure and navigation

**Feature from:** Spotify

:::note
New theme force activated for everyone since 1.2.14
:::

**Description:** New Spotify cover

To enable use the input parameter `-new_theme`

[![Снимок экрана 2023-05-13 121022](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/62529699/238125630-91094cbe-7195-4481-a803-8dac1e63382f.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..f5VTGie7tt3BkkI99bIBwBcA21T2HmCGNfDAawgQNHU)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/62529699/238125630-91094cbe-7195-4481-a803-8dac1e63382f.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..f5VTGie7tt3BkkI99bIBwBcA21T2HmCGNfDAawgQNHU)
